<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_atf_step"><sys_atf_step action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copied_from/><description>Run Server Side Validation Script</description><display_name>Run Server Side Script</display_name><inputs/><mugshots_cache_json/><notes/><order>2</order><snapshot/><step_config display_value="Run Server Side Script">41de4a935332120028bc29cac2dc349a</step_config><sys_class_name>sys_atf_step</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-09-02 15:19:45</sys_created_on><sys_id>8e1e842e1b92b8505331b8449b4bcbc0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Run Server Side Script</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DevTools WORK IN PROGRESS" source="x_snc_devtools">d689f6901bd38450a89720a8ec4bcbfd</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DevTools WORK IN PROGRESS">d689f6901bd38450a89720a8ec4bcbfd</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_atf_step_8e1e842e1b92b8505331b8449b4bcbc0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-09-02 15:19:45</sys_updated_on><table/><test display_value="DevTools - TestAPI">ddfcd8611b567850577f43b5bb4bcb25</test><timeout/><warning_message/></sys_atf_step><sys_variable_value action="delete_multiple" query="document_key=8e1e842e1b92b8505331b8449b4bcbc0"/><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_atf_step</document><document_key>8e1e842e1b92b8505331b8449b4bcbc0</document_key><order>100</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-09-02 15:19:45</sys_created_on><sys_id>1c2ec42e1b92b8505331b8449b4bcb3e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-09-02 15:19:45</sys_updated_on><value>3.1</value><variable display_value="">42f2564b73031300440211d8faf6a777</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_atf_step</document><document_key>8e1e842e1b92b8505331b8449b4bcbc0</document_key><order>200</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-09-02 15:19:45</sys_created_on><sys_id>d02ec42e1b92b8505331b8449b4bcb3f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-09-02 15:19:45</sys_updated_on><value>(function(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual)
{
	var test = new TestAPI(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual);
	
	test.SetResult(true);

	function Hello(strName, strGreeting)
	{
		strName = x_snc_devtools.GetStringValue(strName);
		strGreeting = x_snc_devtools.GetStringValue(strGreeting);
		if (strGreeting == '')
		{
			strGreeting = 'Hello';
		}
		if (strName != '')
		{
			return strGreeting + ' '+strName+'!';	
		}
		return strGreeting+'!';
	}


	function TestCase_Hello(strName, vExpected)
	{
		test.TestCase(
			'Function Hello()',
			Hello,
			{
				'strName': strName 
			},
			vExpected,
			null);
	}

	function TestCase_HelloWithGreeting_CheckResult(vInput,vExpected,vResult)
	{
		return (vExpected == vResult);
	}
	
	function TestCase_HelloWithGreeting(strName, strGreeting, vExpected)
	{
		test.TestCase(
			'Function Hello() with greeting parameter',
			Hello,
			{
				'Name': strName,
				'Greeting': strGreeting,
			},
			vExpected,
			TestCase_HelloWithGreeting_CheckResult);
	}


	TestCase_Hello(null,'Hello!');
	TestCase_Hello('','Hello!');
	TestCase_Hello('John','Hello John!');
	TestCase_Hello('Jane','Hello Jane!');

	TestCase_HelloWithGreeting(null,'Hi','Hi!');
	TestCase_HelloWithGreeting('','Good Morning','Good Morning!');
	TestCase_HelloWithGreeting('John','Salute','Salute John!');
	TestCase_HelloWithGreeting('Jane','Cheerio','Cheerio Jane!');

	
	return test.GetResult();
	
})(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual);</value><variable display_value="">989d9e235324220002c6435723dc3484</variable></sys_variable_value></record_update>
